channel.title: [Added] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-BBDN
channel.description:
The following addition to the IATI Organisation Identifier list has been proposed for Bangladesh Business & Disability Network, a downstream partner of Sightsavers.
They have applied for NGO status in Bangladesh (http://org-id.guide/list/BD-NAB) but intend to publish before will to be added to the [list of NGOs](http://ngoab.gov.bd/sites/default/files/files/ngoab.portal.gov.bd/page/a86a0782_47b2_4756_b226_58e2fd6a97b4/2020-06-16-16-38-c88fba86adf7f8ed722863aa2fa8aba5.pdf), hence this request:
**Code:** XI-IATI-BBDN **Name:** Bangladesh Business & Disability Network **Description:** The Bangladesh Business and Disability Network (BBDN) is a voluntary group of representatives from business, industry, employers’ organizations and selected non-governmental and disabled peoples’ organizations. BBDN has a primary purpose of facilitating disability and work place diversity in Bangladesh from the perspective of the business and human rights cases. **URL:** https://www.bbdn.com.bd/
If no objection is received this XI-IATI code will be approved and added in a week.

item.title: [Added] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-BBDN
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
As there have been no objections to this request, XI-IATI-BBDN is now considered approved and will be added to the codelist in due course.

Read full topic

item.title: [Added] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-BBDN
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
The following addition to the IATI Organisation Identifier list has been proposed for Bangladesh Business & Disability Network, a downstream partner of Sightsavers.

They have applied for NGO status in Bangladesh (http://org-id.guide/list/BD-NAB) but intend to publish before will to be added to the list of NGOs, hence this request:

Code: XI-IATI-BBDN
Name: Bangladesh Business & Disability Network
Description: The Bangladesh Business and Disability Network (BBDN) is a voluntary group of representatives from business, industry, employers’ organizations and selected non-governmental and disabled peoples’ organizations. BBDN has a primary purpose of facilitating disability and work place diversity in Bangladesh from the perspective of the business and human rights cases.
URL: https://www.bbdn.com.bd/

If no objection is received this XI-IATI code will be approved and added in a week.
